```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message=FALSE)
```

# Load required packages

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
```

# Import and clean data

```{r}
# import data
addresses <- read.csv(here::here("data", "Master_Address_Table.csv")) %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  mutate_if(is.factor, as.character)

details <- read_csv(here::here("data", "Real_Estate_Residential_Details.csv"))

joined <- addresses %>% 
  inner_join(details, by=c("OBJECTID"="RecordID_Int")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  na_if(" ") %>% 
  na_if("") %>% 
  remove_empty(c("rows", "cols"))
```

Take a look:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
joined
```

Write out cleaned data

```{r}
joined %>% write_csv(here::here("data", "addresses-joined-to-details.csv"))
```
